tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DancePerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performance_date DATE,
    venue_name VARCHAR(255),
    performer_name VARCHAR(255),
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Dance_Performances (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    venue VARCHAR(255),
    performer_name VARCHAR(255),
    ticket_sales INT
);

CREATE TABLE TicketSales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_id INT,
    venue_id INT,
    performer_id INT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_date_id FOREIGN KEY(date_id) REFERENCES Dates(date_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_venue_id FOREIGN KEY(venue_id) REFERENCES Venues(venue_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_performer_id FOREIGN KEY(performer_id) REFERENCES Performers(performer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Performances (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_id INT,
    venue_id INT,
    performer_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_date_id FOREIGN KEY(date_id) REFERENCES Dates(date_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_venue_id FOREIGN KEY(venue_id) REFERENCES Venues(venue_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_performer_id FOREIGN KEY(performer_id) REFERENCES Performers(performer_id)
);
